title: A proclamation to prohibit His Majesties subjects to trade within the limits assigned to the Royal African Company of England, expect those of the company James R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd, and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: "By the King."
At end of text: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the first day of April, 1685."
